label: Description
value: Letter case or pocket book with tooled brown leather covers. Inside covers have silk panels embroidered with multicolored silks in counted stitch embroidery. One side has an urn with weeping willow tree, the other a wreath of flowers with the initials J.B.

value: Medium: leather, silk Technique: counted stitch embroidery

label: Description
value: Shaped leaf of paper with embossed scrolls and flowers, gold edges, and a turned wood handle. On each side there is a larger center medallion printed in red, surrounded by seven smaller medallions printed in green. On the obverse, the central medallion has a figure of a young woman; on the reverse, a parrot on branch with squirrel is printed in the center medallion.

label: Physical description
value: Engraved paper leaf, turned and painted wood handle

label: Credit line
value: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

Les deux chasseurs et la laitière (The two hunters and the milkmaid)

label: Description
value: Handscreen with a paper leaf and turned wood handle. Obverse: engraved image of two hunters beside a cottage in the woods.  Reverse, bits of dialogue from the play "Les deux chasseurs et la laitiere."

label: Physical description
value: Engraved, hand-colored, and painted paper leaf, turned wood handle

label: Description
value: Design for a screen fan for Mlle. La Montagne, Watteau's mistress. A woman, presumably Mlle. La Montagne, stands in the center of the design amongst a wooded landscape. The woman wears an elegant dress and cape, as well as a headpiece with feathers. She holds a fan in one hand. The border of the design includes a garland and rocaille motifs.

label: Physical description
value: Hand-colored etching on light blue laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Fountain from which drink confronted reindeer with lowered heads. At top, arch with radiating fluting, from which hang two harps. This is the top portion of a much larger arabesque design.

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle featuring an arabesque design. At bottom, two griffons on a base with drapery in pink greens and beige; beneath a vase of flowers with birds on the handles. In center, a diamond-shaped medallion with classical subject on black background, framed with laurel bands and foliage garlands of roses and scrolls of foliage interspersed.
